segments.text: Good morning . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want an American breakfast with fried eggs , sunny side up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of juice do you prefer , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Grapefruit juice and please make my coffee very strong .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . American breakfast with fried eggs , sunny side up , grapefruit juice and a black coffee . Am I correct , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there any thing else , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning , sir . I've brought the breakfast you ordered .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just put it on the table , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you need anything else , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thanks . Ah , yes ! Can I have some more juice for the minibar ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of juice would you like , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tomato , orange and apple juice , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . I'll get them for you right away . Would you please sign this bill first ? Thank you , sir .
segments.speaker: S1
